This is a final email reminder that you are invited to attend the Understanding and Developing Self - In-person Behavioural Workshop on July 3rd, which is held face‚Äìto‚Äìface.

 

If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your attendance yet, kindly respond to the invitation below to secure your spot.

 

We look forward to an engaging and insightful workshop with you. See you soon! üòä

 

With you at heart,



www.chalhoubuniversity.com <http://www.chalhoubuniversity.com/> 

 

 

 

 

 

 

________________________________

 

 



In-person Behavioural Workshops

Date

Thursday | July 3rd, 2025

Time

9:00 A.M. ‚Äì 1:00 P.M.

Venue 

Fashion Room | Retail Academy, D3, building 11, 1st floor 

Facilitator

Razan Badri

Confirmation

Please send your confirmation by June 27th to: Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:francesca.ortaliz@chalhoub.com> 



 

 

Chalhoub University is delighted to invite you to the in-person behavioural workshop on Understanding and Developing Self. Understanding and Developing Self is the ability to reflect on one‚Äôs own strengths, limitations, values, and impact on others in the workplace. This competency involves seeking feedback, learning from experiences, and taking intentional steps to grow personally and professionally. Individuals who demonstrate this competency show self-awareness, adaptability, and a commitment to continuous improvement.

 

Objectives:

As an attendee, you will:

*	Understand what self-awareness is and its importance
*	Identify how to become a more self-aware person
*	Determine the levels and types of self-awareness

chunks.text:
Chalhoub University is delighted to invite you to the in-person behavioural workshop on Understanding and Developing Self. Understanding and Developing Self is the ability to reflect on one‚Äôs own strengths, limitations, values, and impact on others in the workplace. This competency involves seeking feedback, learning from experiences, and taking intentional steps to grow personally and professionally. Individuals who demonstrate this competency show self-awareness, adaptability, and a commitment to continuous improvement.

 

Objectives:

As an attendee, you will:

*	Understand what self-awareness is and its importance
*	Identify how to become a more self-aware person
*	Determine the levels and types of self-awareness

What you need to do before you come to the session?

*	Read all the articles and write notes
*	Watch all the videos and write notes
*	Come prepared with your notes

You can find the articles and videos at this link: Understanding and Developing Self Behavioural Course <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3487> 

Through interactive exercises and meaningful conversations, you will walk away with practical insights, stronger alignment, and a renewed commitment to working together effectively.

 



 

Registration & Confirmation
